q1: Did Fernando Muslera make the mistake against France due to losing his grandmother and uncle days before the match?
a1: I think so; he seemed to be under a lot of stress.
q2: When was the Uruguay team formed?
a2: Uruguay was formed in the year 1900
q3: Fernando Muslera made the mistake against France, but it is not to lose all the blame for having lost
a3: Everything is a team, anything can happen
q4: If you were Uruguay's manager, who would you have played in Muslera's place?
a4: Would you have forced Fernando Muslera to play?
